alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 02 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...All of South Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Broward, Coastal Collier, Coastal Miami-Dade, Coastal Palm Beach, Far South Miami-Dade, Glades, Hendry, Inland Broward, Inland Collier, Inland Miami-Dade, Inland Palm Beach, Mainland Monroe, Metro Broward, Metro Miami-Dade and Metro Palm Beach. * WHEN...From Midnight EDT tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Repeated rounds of excessive rainfall through early Sunday are forecast to produce a widespread 4 to 8 inches of rainfall with amounts up to 12 inches possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
